newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 8.76 pct at Italy dollar repo.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 8.76 pct at Italy dollar repo.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's $4.0 billion Bank of Italy three-month repurchase tender was 8.76 percent against 8.90 percent at the previous one-month tender.
The average indicative rate was 8.77 percent from 8.92 percent at the last foreign currency-denominated repo for 3.0 billion marks on August 13.

The Bank said the funds were assigned at a minimum 12.49 forward points above the 1,518 lire per dollar floor set by the Bank of Italy. The Bank received 28 bids of which 13 were met in full and one in part.
